titles.title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 62, agreed to February 28, 1991 (102nd Congress).

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9944)

bill.summary: 2/24/1993--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 62, 102d Congress, to authorize expenditures by the Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs for professional staff training.
